entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 p.m. MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing near midnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
